name: Monty on the Run (itch) (Rajcsányi László)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy (DMG). Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Original Story:

Monty having escaped from prison and now superfit so that he can quickly make his way to freedom through many hideouts and secret locations. The gold coins located throughout the game must be collected by Monty to enable hime to escape to freedom.

The Gameboy version is based on Jason Perkins's Commodore 16 conversion.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Jump: B
Accept: A
Save/Load game: Start
Map: Select

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: Ctrl, X
Accept: Z
Save/Load game: Enter
Map: Shift

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link:
http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Monty_On_The_Run
